name: Urban Oasis Aparthotel

A fridge, an oven and microwave are also featured, as well as a kettle. The daily breakfast offers Ã  la carte, continental or Full English/Irish options.

name: 3 On Camps Bay
description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at 3 On Camps Bay! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. With an outdoor plunge pool overlooking the rocky Atlantic coast of Camps Bay, 3 on Camps Bay features free private parking. Rooms have balconies and free Wi-Fi.
